Axon.ivy Project Build Plugin
Last Published: 2015-12-10  | Version: 6.0.1-SNAPSHOT
Axon.ivy Project Build Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Reports

project-build:pack-iar

Full name:

com.axonivy.ivy.ci:project-build-plugin:6.0.1-SNAPSHOT:pack-iar

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 03.10.2014.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
iarExcludes String[] 03.10.2014 Define additional IAR excludes with ANT-style exclusion declarations.

The default (always active) exclusions are:

  • All maven default excludes. See AbstractScanner.DEFAULTEXCLUDES
  • 
<iarExcludes>
   <iarExclude>target/**/*</iarExclude>
   <iarExclude>target</iarExclude>
</iarExcludes>

iarFileSets FileSet[] 03.10.2014 Define additional IAR FileSet fileSets with ANT-style exclusion declarations. 

<iarFileSets>
   <iarFileSet>
       <includes>
           <include>**/*</include>
       </includes>
   </iarFileSet>
</iarFileSets>

iarIncludesEmptyDirs boolean 03.10.2014 Includes empty directories in the packed IAR. If set to false, the IAR can not be re-imported as Designer project as standard project artifacts (e.g. source folders) could be missing.
Default value is: true.

Parameter Details

iarExcludes:

Define additional IAR excludes with ANT-style exclusion declarations.

The default (always active) exclusions are:

  • All maven default excludes. See AbstractScanner.DEFAULTEXCLUDES
  • 
<iarExcludes>
   <iarExclude>target/**/*</iarExclude>
   <iarExclude>target</iarExclude>
</iarExcludes>
  • Type: java.lang.String[]
  • Since: 03.10.2014
  • Required: No

iarFileSets:

Define additional IAR FileSet fileSets with ANT-style exclusion declarations. 

<iarFileSets>
   <iarFileSet>
       <includes>
           <include>**/*</include>
       </includes>
   </iarFileSet>
</iarFileSets>
  • Type: org.apache.maven.model.FileSet[]
  • Since: 03.10.2014
  • Required: No

iarIncludesEmptyDirs:

Includes empty directories in the packed IAR. If set to false, the IAR can not be re-imported as Designer project as standard project artifacts (e.g. source folders) could be missing.
  • Type: boolean
  • Since: 03.10.2014
  • Required: No
  • Default: true
